data.title: Apple's Accelerating Tablet Dominance Is Underappreciated
data.text: Apple's tablet dominance is strengthening, and the market is not appreciating it.

data.title: Apple and Eli Lilly are studying if iPhones and Apple Watches can help spot signs of dementia
data.text: Apple has teamed up with Eli Lilly on new research to detect evidence of brain decline by using data from popular connected devices.

data.title: Wednesday Apple Rumors: Apple May Have a Folding iPad or iPhone in 2020
data.text:
Wednesday's Apple Rumors include a survey about Apple Card interest, the release of a new beta for iOS 13 and iPadOS 13 and more.
The post Wednesday Apple Rumors: Apple May Have a Folding iPad or iPhone in 2020 appeared first on InvestorPlace.

data.title: Improving Trends at Apple
data.text: Apple (AAPL) on July 30 reported financial results for the third quarter of fiscal 2019.

data.title: Stagnation, Not the Trade War Is What Keeps Apple Stock Mediocre
data.text: Apple stock has deteriorated mostly for fundamental, not macro, reasons. Only innovation or a game-changing deal can rescue AAPL.

data.title: Apple's App Store growth picked up in July thanks to China, says Morgan Stanley
data.text: Morgan Stanley's Katy Huberty wrote Wednesday that growth rates for Apple Inc.'s AAPL, -1.05% App Store picked up in July following a slowdown throughout the June quarter.
